column2: 18.6.1 Autopilot: Aileron Trim▲ Use of aileron trim with the autopilot engaged?
column3: Aileron Trim▲ Use of aileron trim with the autopilot engaged is prohibited.

column2: 18.6.1 Autopilot: Dual Channel Autopilot Use of dual channel autopilot for approach?
column3: Dual Channel Autopilot Use of dual channel autopilot for approach is prohibited.
